title: Fangs and Frenemies
description: A socially awkward bobcat shifter.An ex-cheerleading vampire.A sweet—but slightly neurotic—cupcake-baking witch.They fight crime? When the case of a missing mean girl throws Hazel back into contact with two old classmates, it’s time for these supernatural frenemies to set aside past grudges and help clear each other’s names.But in the cloudy, romantic beach town of Blue Moon Bay, Oregon, it seems nearly everyone’s guarding a secret. And they all involve magic of one kind of another. Will these three women, who normally can’t stand each other, crack the mystery of what really happened to Hazel’s old bully, Ashlee—or is their effort cursed to fail?
author: Cherry Andrews
